scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.seedIdent: cd server && npm i && npm run seedIdent && npm start
scripts.undoSeedIdent: cd server && npm i && npm run undoSeedIdent && npm start
scripts.seedRecords: cd server && npm i && npm run seedRecords && npm start
scripts.undoSeedRecords: cd server && npm i && npm run undoSeedRecords && npm start
scripts.start: cd server && npm i && npm start
